Class ForecastRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.plogitech.darksky.forecast.ForecastRequestBuilder

extends Object
    Builder to create ForecastRequest objects.
    Author:
    Puls

    • Method Detail

      • key

        public ForecastRequestBuilder key​(APIKey apiKey)
        Parameters:
        apiKey - Your Dark Sky secret key. (Your secret key must be kept secret; in particular, do not embed it in JavaScript source code that you transmit to clients.)
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • location

        public ForecastRequestBuilder location​(GeoCoordinates geoCoordinates)
        Parameters:
        geoCoordinates - The Geo coordinates of a location for which the weather forecast is requested.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • url

        public ForecastRequestBuilder url​(String url)
        Parameters:
        url - Override the default DarksSky API Url. The URL must contain the following patterns for the key and gelocation:
        ##key## ##latitude## ##longitude##
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • language

        public ForecastRequestBuilder language​(ForecastRequestBuilder.Language language)
        Parameters:
        language - The summary properties are returned in the desired language. (Note that units in the summary will be set according to the units parameter, so be sure to set both parameters appropriately.)
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • extendHourly

        public ForecastRequestBuilder extendHourly​()
        When set, return hour-by-hour data for the next 168 hours, instead of the next 48. When using this option, we strongly recommend enabling HTTP compression.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • exclude

        public ForecastRequestBuilder exclude​(ForecastRequestBuilder.Block... block)
        Parameters:
        block - The Blocks which shall be excluded from the response to save data / latency. This method can be called multiple times and the exclusion will add up.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • units

        public ForecastRequestBuilder units​(ForecastRequestBuilder.Units units)
        Parameters:
        units - Return weather conditions in the requested units.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • time

        public ForecastRequestBuilder time​(Instant time)
        Parameters:
        time - The Time for which the historical weather data is returned.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • timeouts

        public ForecastRequestBuilder timeouts​(Timeouts timeouts)
        Parameters:
        timeouts - Override the default timeouts (6 seconds) for connection to the API and reading from the API.
        Returns:
        This for fluent API.

      • build

        public ForecastRequest build​()
        Returns:
        The Request with the given parameters set.
